definition: see 三農問題|三农问题[san1 nong2 wen4 ti2]
the three rural issues: agriculture, rural areas and peasants

sentences.english: And the development of the ecological agriculture is one of the key ways.
sentences.chinese: 发展生态农业是解决“三农”问题的重要手段之一。

sentences.english: The core of the problem is the protection of the right to the contracted management of farm land.
sentences.chinese: 三农问题的核心是农民土地承包经营权的保护问题。

sentences.english: Agriculture, rural development and farmers are among the top concerns and priorities of the Chinese Government.
sentences.chinese: 三农问题是中国政府关注的首要问题。

sentences.english: Receive Challenge, Serve "Agriculture, Countryside and Peasant", Develop the Self-study Examination of High Education Steadily.
sentences.chinese: 迎接挑战，服务三农，稳步发展高教自考。

sentences.english: Resolving the problem of "agriculture, rurality and farmer" is one of the most important work to the Chinese Communist Party.
sentences.chinese: 解决好“三农”问题是全党工作的重中之重。

sentences.english: We will increase policy-based financial supported for agriculture, rural areas, and farmers.
sentences.chinese: 加大政策性金融对“三农”的支持力度。

sentences.english: The Three-agri-issue concerning agriculture, countryside and farmers is the fundamental problem in China.
sentences.chinese: “三农”问题是中国的根本问题。

sentences.english: The 1st document of the central in 2009 adopted by central authorities re-locked on "agriculture."
sentences.chinese: 中央出台的2009年一号文件再度锁定“三农”。

sentences.english: Solving the issue of "Agriculture, Countryside, and Peasant" is the significant mission in constructing over all well-off Society.
sentences.chinese: 解决“三农”问题是全面建设小康社会的重大任务。

sentences.english: Striving to do our work related to agriculture, rural areas, and farmers well, and consolidating and strengthening the agricultural foundation.
sentences.chinese: 毫不放松地做好“三农”工作，巩固和加强农业基础。

sentences.english: Increasing farmers' income is the key to the issues concerning agriculture, countryside and farmers.
sentences.chinese: 农民增收是解决“三农”问题的关键。

sentences.english: Farmers" income is the core of the"three agriculture problems"-the problems of farmers, countryside and agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 农民收入问题是我国“三农”问题的核心。

sentences.english: "Farming, Countryside and Peasantry" is the key cause of a disharmonious society.
sentences.chinese: “三农”问题是不和谐社会的最关键因素。

sentences.english: In forth, the change of villages, agriculture and peasants which bring from urbanization is an indivisible aspect of urbanization.
sentences.chinese: 其四，“三农”问题是城市化进程涉及的农村层面。

sentences.english: Townlet plays a main role in solving three agricultural problems.
sentences.chinese: 小城镇担负解决“三农”问题的主要角色。

definition: Huinong district of Shizuishan city 石嘴山市[Shi2 zui3 shan1 shi4], Ningxia
the three rural issues: agriculture, rural areas and peasants
modernization of agriculture, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
Fumin county in Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
Huimin county in Binzhou 濱州|滨州[Bin1 zhou1], Shandong
to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
to lift oneself out of poverty
